title: Cambria
content:
Would you use Cambria for a Sign [about 24h 65w] sign for a small mexican restaurant?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sample.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418190421/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_50.jpg) | 11.84 KB |
author: dtapia

comments.content:
With so many beautiful mexican typefaces\* out there (I mean actually from Mexico), why?

\* Just _one_ example:  
 [http://www.kimeratype.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418190421/http:/www.kimeratype.com/ "http://www.kimeratype.com/")

-ricard0

Thank you for the recommendation. Those fonts look gorgeous and I will most like change it. Do you know of more site of similar fonts, google turns up many ugly fonts.

Thanks

Well, there aren’t many typefaces of that level.  
You could start from here:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/search/mexico/all/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418190421/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/mexico/all/ "http://new.myfonts.com/search/mexico/all/")
